title: Was Mike Lyndell's view of "absolute evidence" of electoral fraud applied to the content of the designation of acquittal as an opinion?
subtitle: OANN: "The statements and allegations expressed in this programme are presented at this time only as opinions and are not intended to be taken or interpreted by viewers as established facts."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Before my CEO Mike Lindell started the election, OANN published the theory of the fraud conspiracy video "Indecent evidence," saying that the allegations expressed within should be taken as opinions, not as facts.
